message.content: {"id": "102516", "title": "Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand", "description": "Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand. The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.", "OB": "Currently, when the data set editor is opened, it immediately queries the entire schema, causing a long waiting time. Additionally, if there are more than 500 items, users receive an error message stating that only 500 items can be viewed in the available list.", "EB": "The loading of the tree should be deferred until the user expands the tree or applies a filter. This will improve the performance and prevent the error message when there are more than 500 items.", "SR": "Bug 101372 requests the ability to filter based on the schema. It would be beneficial to implement this filter function together with the deferred loading of the tree."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '102516', 'title': 'Bug 102516JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand', 'description': 'Bug 102516JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists thetables and columns in your data source. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Could the load of the tree bedeferred until the user expands the tree or applys a filter? ', 'SR': 'When the data set editor is opened youhave to wait while the entire schema is queried and eventually get the "Only 500items can be viewed in the available list...".Bug <a href="https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/showbug.cgi?id=101372"101372</aasks for the ability to filter based on schema. '}
